subject: Re: [PATCH v2 0/2] x86/virt/tdx: Print TDX module version to dmesg

reviews.author: Vishal Verma (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Vishal Verma requested an update on the status of a previously submitted patch, specifically asking about the plan for merging it into tip.git and offering to help move it along.

reviews.author: Edgecombe, P
reviews.summary: Reviewer Edgecombe agreed to the patch and gave a Reviewed-by tag, but also mentioned that Xiaoyao is sending a rebase after RC1.

reviews.author: Huang, Kai
reviews.summary: Reviewer Huang approved the patch and gave a Reviewed-by tag, indicating no major issues or concerns.

reviews.author: Xiaoyao Li
reviews.summary: Reviewer Xiaoyao Li raised a minor concern about the order of version fields in the retrieved metadata, suggesting it's better to move major_version before minor_version for readability.

reviews.author: Binbin Wu
reviews.summary: Reviewer Binbin Wu approved the patches and provided a minor nit about a formatting mismatch between the change log and code.

reviews.author: Kiryl Shutsemau
reviews.summary: Reviewer requested to queue the patch after -rc1 is tagged, indicating it needs further review and cannot be merged yet.

reviews.author: Dave Hansen
reviews.summary: Dave Hansen reviewed patch v2 and suggested picking up other TDX-related patches, but did not raise any specific technical concerns or objections.

reviews.author: Xu Yilun
reviews.summary: The reviewer, Xu Yilun, raised a concern about the field IDs in the TDX global metadata being human-readable hex magic numbers, suggesting that they should be more carefully copied from an Excel file to the C code.

reviews.author: Tony Lindgren
reviews.summary: Tony Lindgren reviewed the patch and gave it a positive review, indicating that it is great to have for debugging purposes.
